p: Essential oils were extracted by steam distillation. 1000 g rhizomes of crude AL and bran-processed AL were placed in round bottom flasks, respectively. 8000 mL water was added. Distilling flasks with the volatile oil extractor and condenser were connected. The distilling flask needed to be heated at 100°C for 8 h by a heating mantle. Finally, the essential oils were collected [ 10]. Stock solutions were prepared by dissolving 200 mg extracts in 1 mL dimethyl sulphoxide (DMSO) and adding DMEM to 100 mL. The stock solutions were filtered with a sterile 0.22 μm microporous membrane, stored at 4°C and protected from light.
